page.title: 12RISELEY NEWSLETTER(2)
page.content: My job as editor is to collect the items for inclusion. A week before the closing date for the submission of items I ask the bookings secretary of the Village Hall for details of the events due to take place in the Village Hall in the next couple of months. I contact the appropriate organizations, if they have not already contacted me , and ask them if they would like me to publicise their events . (Regular users of the Playgroup, the Lower School Parent Teachers Association, and the amateur theatre group, the 'Riseley Players'.). The Parish Council also use the Newsletter. The local community college regulary publicise their courses in it. To sum up,items of interest to the village come to me from various sources. At the end of each Newsletter,there is a "For Sale".
